A fictional story set in the late 1300's about a group of five soldiers who
are returning home from battle. As they journey back across different lands,
hungry and exhausted they request food and lodging for the night in a fort.
Inside the fort the experience some peculiar behavior, and whilst four of the
soldiers decide to ignore it, Tristan can't seem to help getting involved,
only problem is he takes it a step too far.
